name: AmazingPriceView
summary: It is a library with animation that comes down as the number is alpha-blended every time you enter a number.
description: It is a library with animation that comes down as the number is alpha-blended every time you enter a number. You can get the price information entered on the screen and set the maximum price, minimum price, animation time, and place holder. You can handle the status of the view at the maximum & minimum price in the delegate functions.
